title: A Time of Gifts. On Foot to Constantinople: from the Hook of Holland to the Middle Danube [With Introductory Letter to Xan Fielding]
description: A 'Time of Gifts' sees patrick Leigh Fermor setting out at the age of eighteen, in 1933, on his epic journeyacross Europe from the Hook of holland to Consantinople. This first volume takes us as far as Hungary.
author: Patrick Leigh Fermor
